name.ja: <ruby>古代の進軍<rt>アンティーク・ギアアドバンス</rt></ruby>

text.en: When this card is activated: Add 1 "Ancient Gear" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, except "Ancient Gear Advance". Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 monster; draw 1 card, and if you do, for the rest of this turn, you can Normal Summon Level 5 or higher monsters that are "Ancient Gear Golem" or mention it without Tributing. You can only activate 1 "Ancient Gear Advance" per turn. You cannot Set cards the turn you activate this card.
